subject: RE: [junit] Java 1.4 and JUnit. Contradiction?
msgSnippet: ... 1.4.1 REGRESSION: Windows XP freezes on Java application exit/draw http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4713003.html fixed in 1.4.1_02
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Scott Stirling [mailto:scottstirling@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2003 12:54 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Java 1.4 and JUnit. Contradiction?
>
>
> > From: Roman Rytov [mailto:rrytov@...]
> >
> > Surprisingly fail of JUnit crashes my WindowsXP copmuter to blue-
> > screen. Whenever I get an error in JUnit UI-window next click to
> > close the window leads the computer to crash.
> > Ideas?
>
> It's probably a JVM and graphics driver problem. Someone was
> discussing
> this on the TDD list recently. Apparently there's a bug in
> the JVM and/or
> Windows XP graphics driver (not sure who the guilty party
> really is) for
> some video cards. I believe the solution is to get the
> latest and greatest
> release of 1.4 from Sun, where they've put in a patch for the problem.

"1.4.1 REGRESSION: Windows XP freezes on Java application exit/draw"
http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4713003.html

fixed in 1.4.1_02

Anybody knows if this version is generaly available?

Bernd

> Scott Stirling
>
